name: Super Raft Boat Together
description:
The world's been flooded! Why, you ask? No one knows! But perhaps you’ll find clues during your perilous (FUN!) journey to the (MYTHICAL?) Final Island.



Team up with up to 3 friends in online co-op to tackle ever-changing roguelike runs through a wide variety of thrilling biomes. Select trinkets wisely to construct the overpowered build that will finally lead you and your crew to paradise! (Or… to DOOM! Most likely doom, let’s be honest.)



Key features:
  • Play with up to 3 friends in online multiplayer, or go solo if you dare!
  • A unique blend of shooter and builder – expand your raft while defending it from the creatures of the sea who (rudely!) seek to destroy it!
  • Gather wealth from your fallen foes and use it to buy upgrades to strengthen your crew!
  • Unlock new weapons and cosmetics for your favorite characters as you play!
  • Looking for a real challenge? Give looping a shot! (And try not to develop a permanent marine life phobia while you’re at it!)
  • Super Raft Boat Together is the multiplayer sequel to the beloved Super Raft Boat Classic by Shattered Journal Games!
